column1: * 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Roger Verhulst (3 May 1966).
* 1968 - Author Michael D.C. Drout is born.
* 1981 - The ninth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 1996 - Author and academic Charles Moorman dies.
* 2009 - The fan film The Hunt for Gollum is released online.
